previous.excerpt: 📈HireBeat for Employers is an automated interview screening platform that saves employers time 🕗 and money💰! HireBeat delivers one-way interview invitations that allow the employer to review & evaluate candidate performance anytime, anywhere.
previous.title: HireBeat - Automated interview platform that accelerates hiring process

localize.description: 📈HireBeat for Employers是一个自动面试筛选平台，为雇主节省时间🕗和金钱💰! HireBeat提供单向面试邀请，让雇主随时随地审查和评估候选人的表现。
localize.tagline: 自动面试平台，加速招聘流程。

localize.description: 📈HireBeat for Employers是一個自動面試篩選平臺，爲僱主節省時間🕗和金錢💰! HireBeat提供單向面試邀請，讓僱主隨時隨地審查和評估候選人的表現。
localize.tagline: 自動面試平臺，加速招聘流程。

next.excerpt: TweetDeets gives you an insightful look at a Twitter account's activity. Instead of just a feed of tweets, you see their posting calendar, most frequent posting times, top words, posts by platform, and more in a clean, shareable report.
next.title: TweetDeets - Simple, handy metrics for any public Twitter account

localize.description: TweetDeets让你深入了解一个Twitter账户的活动。你可以在一个干净的、可分享的报告中看到他们的发帖日历、最频繁的发帖时间、最热门的词、按平台分类的帖子等，而不仅仅是一个推文的feed。
localize.tagline: 任何公共Twitter账户都有简单、方便的指标。

localize.description: TweetDeets讓你深入瞭解一個Twitter賬戶的活動。你可以在一個乾淨的、可分享的報告中看到他們的發帖日曆、最頻繁的發帖時間、最熱門的詞、按平臺分類的帖子等，而不僅僅是一個推文的feed。
localize.tagline: 任何公共Twitter賬戶都有簡單、方便的指標。
